name: Swiss Federal Railways
description: Integrate timetables, fare details and bookings of Swiss public transport into your business processes.

descriptions.value: Integrate timetables, fare details and bookings of Swiss public transport into your business processes.
Einbinden von Fahrplänen, Tarifdetails und Buchungen des öffentlichen Nahverkehrs der Schweiz (SBB) in deine Geschäftsprozesse
